name: black-flute
effect: Used outside of battle : Decreases the wild Pokémon encounter rate by 50%.
short_effect: Halves the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

flavor_text.black_white: A toy flute made from black glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A toy flute made from black glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
